Posts.Content: amandaglick30 wrote: A few months ago during an mri of my chest they found a mass, at that time that is not what they were looking for. i have some swelling above my right breat on my chest. they were trying to figure out why. so after they found the mass, i had to get a mammogram and then a biopsy. It turned out to be Fibroadenoma. So i was relieved. Since then i have noticed different lumps in my right breast. felt one that move around but i dont feel it anymore. now i have a hard bump in my breast. i do have some achiness and sometimes sharp pains in and around my breast. hugging my kids hurts at time. i mad another appointment for a mammogram.  am i being too paranoid? is this anything anyone else has gone thru? What was your outcome?    I also read that after having fibroadenoma, you can have a slightly higher risk of breast cancer.  I have three kids and i dont want to leave them. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: worried about the pain in my breast amandaglick30 Young_Ignored
